headline: Jim Cramer Calls Ralph Lauren a “Terrifically Well-Run” Company

headline: Expedia (EXPE) Upgraded to Strong Buy: Here's Why
summary: Expedia (EXPE) might move higher on growing optimism about its earnings prospects, which is reflected by its upgrade to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy).

headline: Rivian Hires Greg Revelle as Chief Customer Officer
summary: IRVINE, Calif., January 12, 2026--Rivian (NASDAQ: RIVN) today announced the appointment of Greg Revelle to Chief Customer Officer (CCO) of Rivian. Revelle joins Rivian from Revatek, a startup he founded dedicated to enhancing the off-grid outdoor experience through innovative energy storage. He has also held leadership roles at Kohl’s, Best Buy, AutoNation and Expedia, in addition to being a current board member at Cars.com. headline: Here's What to Expect From Expedia Group's Next Earnings Report
summary: Expedia Group is scheduled to announce its fiscal fourth-quarter earnings soon, and analysts project a double-digit profit growth.
